actions.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-785 to state that no funding in this Act shall be used or otherwise made available by this Act to end Reserve Officers Training Corps (ROTC) programs at HBUCs, Hispanic Serving Institutions and Tribal Colleges and Universities.
